articles.author: Kalyan Parbat
articles.title: Vodafone Idea clearing dues to banks first to avoid a visit to bankruptcy court: Experts - Economic Times
articles.description: ...it would make sense for Vi to ensure its bank dues are paid on time, in precedence to vendor debt, to avoid being potentially dragged to NCLT by financial creditors in future,  Sanjeev Kumar, partner, Luthra and Luthra Law Offices India, told ET.
